def calculate_max_joy(N, V):
    count = 1
    ans = 0
    s = -1
    while count != N:
        ans -= s
        s -= 1
        count += 1
    return sum(V) - ans

def calculate_max_joy(N, V):
    count = -1
    ans = 0
    s = -1
    while count != N:
        ans -= s
        s -= 1
        count += 1
    return sum(V) - ans
